name: QMATIC System
description: Implemented the QMATIC system with the goal to enhance customer service efficiency. The primary objectives of the project were to reduce customer service time, minimize delays, automate processes, and enhance employee capacity
skills: PM (Project Management), Data Analytics, Staff Training, Process Automation
achievements: Reduced customer service time from 40 minutes to 20 minutes
Decreased delay periods from 1 hour to 10 minutes
Increased the capacity and efficiency of employees

name: Agile Transformation
description: A Company with 7,000 employees (TBC BANK) needed to change its corporate culture and management methodology
achievements: Implemented agile methodologies with McKinsey for substantial organizational improvements

name: Multi-Currency Loan
description: Many customers faced dissatisfaction due to disparities between their loan currency and salary currency, leading to fluctuating monthly payments caused by exchange rate variations. This inconsistency not only created confusion for customers but also increased the risk for the bank, making it challenging to manage and predict cash flows accurately
tools: API Integration, Product Development, Risk Assessment Algorithms, UI/UX Design
achievements: Increased positive feedback by 40%, reducing complaints by 23%%
Decreased company risk rate by 10% through strategic currency risk management
Contributed to a 5% profit increase and 3% decrease in non-performing loans

name: Loan Management System(LMS)Deployment
description: The bank aimed to meet international standards for listing shares on the London Stock Market. Existing systems lacked efficiency, hindering the bank's ability to produce new products swiftly and exposing it to unnecessary risks. Data management was outdated, requiring a modern solution for seamless integration and migration
tools: System Architecture, SQL, API Integration (REST, SOAP), Python, ETL, Apache Kafka
skills: Analytical Thinking, Project Management, Risk Management
achievements: Successfully implemented a secure and scalable Loan Management System (LMS), meeting criteria for London Stock Market listing
Orchestrated over 30 integrations, enhancing operational efficiency through REST and SOAP APIs
Implemented middleware solutions using Apache Kafka, improving data management and accessibility
Executed flawless data migration using ETL tools like Apache NiFi, ensuring a smooth transition and minimizing disruptions
